job.title: Electrical Design Engineer
job.description: If you are a Electrical Design Engineer with experience please read onbrbrWe are a consulting firm that works in California and Texas providing mechanical electrical and plumbing support We are looking for an Electrical Design engineer to assist our project managers with completing projects We are currently experiencing growth and need new talent to join our teambrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrYou will be working alongside a Project Manager to oversee all projects and make sure they are completed in a timely manner Using AutoCAD and Revit you will develop detailed voltage drop calculations as well as single line drawings You will conduct lighting calculations and designsbrbrWhat You Need for this Positionbrbrstrongu RequiredbrustrongulliMasters Degree in Electrical Engineering Data Analytics or related fieldsliliAutoCAD and Revit software experiencebrliulWhats In It for Youbrbr60K110K DOEbrbrMedicalDentalVisionbrbrPTObrbrSo if you are a Electrical Design Engineer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrAmyFloresCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  AF41647406  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulAmy Flores  Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United
